item.title: Manage Your Cables Before They Manage You
item.description:
Network cabling can quickly become chaotic and overwhelming, much like weeds taking over an empty lot. Unorganized wiring, often referred to as a “rat’s nest,” is a common problem that creates confusion and makes troubleshooting difficult. The solution to this problem is simple: organization. While organizing existing cables can be tedious, it is essential and best done sooner rather than later. Designing a structured cabling system from the outset is the most effective approach...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/manage-your-cables-before-they-manage-you/
